body_html: We only have 1 THTensor type now, so the function doesn't need to be virtual, except we haven't fully dealt with dense + sparse yet. So IMO the right thing to do is to create a blocker issue on 1.0 that the function can't be virtual (or we measure that it doesn't matter) and we don't force an order-of-operations refactor yet.
body_text: We only have 1 THTensor type now, so the function doesn't need to be virtual, except we haven't fully dealt with dense + sparse yet. body: We only have 1 THTensor type now, so the function doesn't need to be virtual, except we haven't fully dealt with dense + sparse yet.  So IMO the right thing to do is to create a blocker issue on 1.0 that the function can't be virtual (or we measure that it doesn't matter) and we don't force an order-of-operations refactor yet.
